attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election so that the will of the people may be satisfied.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the appalling state of politics and the morals of politicians in Great Britain we demand a General Election so that the citizens of Great Britain may decide if we wish to continue to be governed by an un-elected Prime Minister ruling over a 'Toothless Bulldog' of a Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
